SEARCH
Package controller.view

Class AlbumViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.view.AlbumViewController
public class AlbumViewController extends Object
Controller class for managing the album view in the Photo App.

This class allows a user to view, create, rename, delete, and open photo albums. It also handles navigation back to the login screen.

  • Constructor Details

    • AlbumViewController

      public AlbumViewController()

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(model.User currUser, model.PhotoManager photoManager)
      Initializes the controller with the current user and photo manager.
      Parameters:
      currUser - the currently logged-in user
      photoManager - the PhotoManager instance managing user and album data

    • createAlbum

      public void createAlbum()
      Prompts the user to enter a new album name and adds it to their collection. Saves changes and refreshes the album list upon success.

    • deleteAlbum

      public void deleteAlbum()
      Deletes the selected album after showing a confirmation prompt. Does not allow deletion if no album is selected.

    • renameAlbum

      public void renameAlbum()
      Prompts the user to rename the selected album. Updates the album name and refreshes the album list.

    • openAlbum

      public void openAlbum()
      Opens the selected album and transitions to the photo view screen. Shows a warning if no album is selected.

    • logout

      public void logout()
      Logs out the current user, saves user data, and navigates back to the login view.
